mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (user_id, content, like_count, comment_count, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{content}, #{likeCount}, #{commentCount}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, content, like_count, comment_count, is_deleted, created_at, updated_at FROM post WHERE id = #{id} AND is_deleted = 0

SELECT p.id, p.user_id, p.content, p.like_count, p.comment_count, p.is_deleted, p.created_at, p.updated_at FROM post p WHERE p.user_id = #{userId} AND p.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY p.updated_at DESC, p.id DESC

SELECT p.id, p.user_id, p.content, p.like_count, p.comment_count, p.is_deleted, p.created_at, p.updated_at FROM post p WHERE p.user_id = #{userId} AND p.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY p.updated_at DESC, p.id DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET is_deleted = 1, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM post WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_deleted = 0
SELECT COUNT(*) AS postCount, COALESCE(SUM(like_count), 0) AS totalLikeCount, COALESCE(SUM(comment_count), 0) AS totalCommentCount FROM post WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_deleted = 0
